title: Staycation experience at Posto Dormire

text: Salah satu hotel dengan konsep terlucu dan unik, cocok buat yg suka foto-foto. Lokasinya strategis, disekeliling banyak yg jual makanan. Petugasnya cukup ramah juga. Kamarnya memang ngga terlalu besar but nyaman(+bantalnya banyak). Washtafel yg ada diluar kamar mandi, bikin jadi agak hati hati aja kalo mau pake biar ga becek. Water heater berfungsi dengan baik walopun tiap dinyalain ngeluarin bunyi yg lumayan kenceng (room 512). Ruangan cukup ngga gitu soundproof, soalnya suara di lorong masi kedengeran. Breakfast cukup variatif dan enak enak menunya. Dua malam nginep, menu makanan berat yg diganti cuma bagian sayur sama lauknya aja. Nasi putih, nasi goreng sama gorengan tetap ada. Nilai plus buat waffle, nasi goreng sama scramble eggnya
title: A Good Place to Stay

text: Kolam renang mungkin agak buram airnya. Lantai kamar mandi agak licin. Yang lainnya bersih dan bagus. Sarapannya enak🙂🙂 mungkin di perbanyak promo di travel2 lain biar dapet diskon untuk booking kembali di posto☺.
title: Nice

text:
Hotel ini cukup unik. Mengusung beragam tema dalam satu hotel. Kamarnya mengusung tema industrial minimalis. Cukup nyaman, meski saya tidak mendapat kamar dengan view dari jendela.

Yang lebih unik adalah poolnya yang ada di lantai dua. Poolnya dibuat transparan dan kelihatan dari lantai lobby. Sehingga saat proses check ini bisa melihat orang yang berenang di atas kepala kita.

Selain itu ada pula cafe and bar di lantai atas. tempat  menyenangkan untuk bersantai dengan teman atau telasi. Nah tema di sini lebih ke marine. Cafe dibuat menyerupai kapal selam.

Dan di lantai paling atas ada rooftop dengan pemandangan kawasan Grogol dan sekitarnya.  Di lantai ini ada pula toilet yang tak kalah uniknya. Toilet kapsul yang didesain seperti diskotik. Penuh lampu disko, namun ruang toiletnya didesain menyerupai dinosaurus.
title: Hotel Tematik Nan Unik

title: 2 malam di posto dormire

text:
Serius pak Efri itu manager yang menemui saya? Kok plonga-plongo ya? Gak sat set sat set kerjanya, gak bisa mencari solusi terbaik untuk tamu hotel. Saya sudah bilang ke FO saat selesai check in, jika kamar panas. Masih aja suruh tunggu 30 menit! Sampai malam masih panas juga! Saya bawa orangtua, harusnya cepat tanggap dong! Teknisi datang 2x, yang kedua baru dingin. Selang 2 jam sampe check out PANAS LAGI. Hal paling lucu penawaran FO:
1. Mau dibawain blower ke kamar
2. Nunggu ada yang check out

Di beri kamar baru tapi kondisi sama saja, ditambah lagi ibu saya dari cari angin di luar hotel sampai beliau tidur lagi ke kamar. Luar biasa service manager dan jajaran yang bertugas pada 8/10/22 yang sangat amat buruk!!

title: Travelling

text:
Lokasi: strategis, persis di depan halte busway Sumber Waras.

Desain & Dekor: unik banget. Kolam renang dengan lantai kaca, terletak persis di atas lobby. Jadi kita bisa liat gerak gerik perenang dari lobby. Lucu...
Peletakan bathtub di kamar tidur ini yang cozy, dan wah untuk hotel dengan harga segini. Cuma kurang disediakan bubble bath aja.

Resto lt.10 di desain ala kapal selam, total banget, lengkap dengan telpon ala jadul dan pintu besi bener2 kayak kapal selam. Resto lt.2 nuansa down to earth dengan meja buffet nuansa kayu, dan meja makan dengan gowes-an dikolongnya.

F&B: Food nya biasa aja, tapi minumannya cukup banyak pilihan dengan harga terjangkau.

Petugas/kru: ramah, sopan, helpful dan quick action.

Overall, sukkkaa banget dengan hotel ini.
title: Healing di sini aja...

title: Stay hotel

text:
Saya meningap disini tgl 26 - 28 Febuary 2019... 

Untuk service ckp oke tp ada satu kesalahan fatal menurut saya apalagi menyangkut identitas

Jadi KTP saya mereka lupa mengembalikannya dan sy baru sadar pada hari ini tgl 29 februari...menurut saya kesalahan itu sangat amat Fatal karena KTP sangat penting dan mereka ada no telepon sy seharusnya mereka menginformasikan kalau saya ketinggalan KTP apalagi saya juga pas check out mengambil uang deposit..

Jadi kl semisalkan saya tidak menyadarinya dan sya tidak telpon ke hotel mereka tidak akan menginformasikan bahwa KTP saya tertinggal...

Yang menghandle saya pas check in namanya Pratama
title: Tidak Care dengan Tamu

text: Hari ini tgl 19 des 2019 adalah pengalaman terburuk saya selama menginap di hotel. Saya diberi kamar di lantai 9 dengan alasan kamar full, dan ternyata saya dan istri sangat sulit untuk berusaha tidur karena terganggu oleh suara musik yang begitu bising dari lantai 10, tidak main-main, suara nya sampai menggetarkan kaca jendela. Dan pada saat check in saya tdk diberi informasi apapun tentang hal ini. Lalu dengan cukup sabar saya komplain secara baik2 pada pukul 2 pagi, dan menurut informasi bar close pada pukul 2 pagi. sedangkan pada saat saya komplain itu waktu sudah menunjukkan pukul 02.10 . Setelah komplain bukan mereda, malahan tambah kenceng musik nya. pukul 02.30 saya kembali komplain. masih tidak ada perubahan. pukul 03.17 kesabaran saya sudah habis, saya kembali komplain untuk yang ke tiga kalinya. baru lah musik nya berhenti pada pukul 03.20 pagi. ini akan menjadi hr pertama dan terakhir saya menginap di hotel posto dormire jakarta.
title: Sulit tidur karena berisik

text: Ini baru aja terjadi.. Kebetulan saya ma suami dah kelaperan banget, nyari2 di seputaran di seputaran dr.susilo grogol dan lewatlah kita di Hotel Posto Dormire.. So, kita lgsg melipir dunks masuk ke restonya walo kita ga nginep disitu.. Design hotelnya keren banget, artistik gitu.. Staff F&Bnya cukup cekatan.. Tapi.. Setelah kita tunggu 30 menit makanan ga dateng2, padahal ga ada orang lain yg mesen makanan disitu.. So, wkt ditanya juga jwbnnya selalu sama 'sebentar lagi, pak' sampe ga tau berapa lama lagi.. So, tolong perbaiki layanan di bagian dapur or FnBnya.. Karena dari 'something' gini bisa berimbas ke yang awalnya "kapan2 kita pengen nginep disini", jadi "ga mau nginep disini". For other thing, I can't give a review, coz kita ga nginep disitu..
title: For me, it's not really good..

text:
Saya memesan 1 kamar untuk 1 malam di hotel ini buat short escape gitu ceritanya. Proses check in termasuk cepat sehingga saya tidak perlu menunggu lama meski saya masih ingin menikmati suasana lobby boutiqe hotel yang bertema antik ini. Saat masuk kamar, kamar sudah rapi & bersih, plus dingin karena AC sudah dinyalakan. Ternyata tema antik juga terasa di dalam kamar yang kelihatan dari pemilihan perabotan isi kamar. Suasana juga tenang dan nyaman. Yang saya suka juga adalah salah satu sisi kamar full cermin bikin saya kelamaan selfie *ups
Waktu malam, kebetulan ada all you can eat buffet yang per orangnya Rp 60.000 aja! Dan itu variannya banyak! Kan jadi enak yaa.. Mana waktu makan disamperin sama managernya, Pak Aulia. Chit chat sebentar tapi berasa vip ga sih diperhatiin kaya gitu.
Habis makan malam, langsung naik, bukan ke kamar, tapi ke sky barnya hotel ini! Tadi nemu live acoustic di resto di bawah, sekarang nemu live acoustic juga di skybar! Sooo entertained! Saya bisa puas ngobrol sama temen saya sambil menikmati city view.
Karena makin malam makin rame dan karena udah ngantuk juga, saya pun balik ke kamar untuk istirahat.
Besok paginya saya sarapan dan ketemu varian breakfast yg totally beda sama menu all you can eat kemarin malam. Seneng deh jadi bisa coba macem macem.
Oia, kolam renang di sini juga lain dari yang lain karena dasar kolamnya bisa kelihatan dari lobby hotel loh!
Overall, nginep di hotel ini, aku sih yesssss
title: A delightful experience! Thank u Posto Dormire!

text:
Posto Dormire Hotel ⭐⭐⭐
Jl. Doktor Susilo Raya No. 3
Deluxe Room

Millenial yang doyan travel - foto - upload kudu banget cobain Posto Dormire Hotel, dijamin batere kalian langsung bakalan drained out saking banyaknya spot - spot foto manja di sini. Mulai dari lobby, restoran, kamar, bar & lounge..4 thumbs up banget buat konsep desain interiornya, dengan konsep desain industrial dan khusus untuk di bar & loungenya dibuat ala2 kapal laut apa kapal selam deg tu keren abis pokoke.

Dan yang paling unik seunik2nya adalah adanya kolam renang yang dasarnya transparan dan bisa kita liat dari lobby, jadi tinggal dongak di atas kita itu ya kolam renangnya. Keren abis.

Lokasinya juga strategis banget di Jl. Dkktor Susilo Raya, di mana sepanjang jalan itu sarangnya tempat makan mahasiswa2. Di samping itu di seberang hotel ini ada halte busway, jadi asli gampang banget akses ke sini. 
Salah satu yang gw suka juga kualitas SDM nya yang improved juga, jadi ga jomplang sama kualitas fisik bangunan. Semuanya ramah dan helpful mulai dari security, recepsionist sampai mbak - mbak yang jaga di breakfast room.

Dan sarapannya juga anti mainstream lho, kita bisa order atau self service mie instan di sini..heehe...baru kali ini gw nemu. It's a breakthrough 3 stars hotel lah buat gw mah 🤘🤘🤘
title: Hotel yang cocok banget buat milenial dan selebgram dengan desain industrial

text: Untuk ke 4x nya Saya stay disini, Saya sangat suka.. text:
Awalnya book hotel ini karena liat design hotelnya lucu and instagrammable..dan memang pas nyampe sana liat design hotelnya unik..resepsionis juga ramah..lalu ketika sy minta late check out juga diijinkan. Tapi banyak minusnya juga :
1. Tempat parkirnya entah kecil atau karena full oleh org yg datang ke bar,ketika kita sampe,kita harus parkir di pinggir jalan di seberang hotel,mungkin dijagain satpam tapi namanya di pinggir jalan bikin kita worry
2. Kebetulan kita dapet kamar di lantai 9,begitu naik ke lt9,wah berisik banget ada suara musik kenceng dari bar lt10,nyampe kamar pun masi kedengeran,kamarnya ga ada kedap suara
3. Kebersihan spreinya mungkin harus diperhatiin lagi karena keliatan kotor gitu
4. Varian breakfast sedikit.. Lalu saat saya mau minta dibuatkan telur rebus,pegawainya bilang karena hari ini ga ada menu telur,jadi jika ingin telur rebus harus dikenakan charge.. padahal selama saya nginep di berbagai hotel lain *3 atau *4,tiap saya minta dibuatkan telur rebus,pasti disanggupin dan ga pernah dibilang kena charge atau apa,jadi kecewa banget disini.

Mohon diperhatikan lagi.. makasi
title: Menginap di posto dormire

text: Hotelnya lucuuk banget. Buat pecinta foto, mari melipir. Restoran ada di lobby dan lantai 10. Semuanya punya tempat foto yang bagus. Makanan di 3rd place restaurannya enak dan terjangkau sekali. Senang kalau ke sini ajak teman-teman.
title: Staycation di instagramable Hotel

text:
Suasa hotel yg cozy,  dan kamar suite yang sangat bagus sangat cocok dengan pasangan. Dan terima kasih untuk kaka Synta untuk dinner nya sangat enaak apalagi bebek nya.  
Staff receptionist yang ramah embuatbsaya dan teman saya akan kembali menikmati fasilitas hotl nya..
title: Kamar bagus

text:
Untuk ke jakarta saya selalunya tinggal di hotel ini dan biasanya saya tinggal untuk 1 minggu. Sangat betah tinggal dikamar suite,dengan harga yang masuk akal dan fasilitas yang memukau dan lokasi yang strategis.sayangnya disaat extend waktu tinggal,kamar suite sold out. Selama beberapa hari saya masih kerasan ingin tinggal disana, saya cari online,aplikasi manapun, staf-staf resepsionis bantu saya cari kamar suite yang kosong,alhasil nihil.

Pada akhirnya Aldo(resepsionis) bantu saya mendapatkan Family suite dengan harga yang masih masuk akal.Memang kamar yang terlalu besar untuk 1 orang tidur. Tapi gpp lah ya...bisa guling2...🤣
So overall review;
1.receptionist; ramah,membantu,cekatan, n Aldo resepsionis yg sangat membantu saya sejauh ini.
2.kamar;luas,air panas yang nyaman.,🛀 mantap,fasilitas unik n lengkap.tapi ga ada hair dryer 😕
3.breakfast;good tapi harus divariasikan lagi n extend waktunya jadi 10.30.kalau bisa.

4.parking;sedikit susah untuk teman saya parkir mobilnya.alangkah lebih baik jika ada vallet.

5.akses;mau ke pusat atau barat,kuliner,roxy? Yes! Akses yang sangat mudah!

6.plus point; konsep hotel yang unik dan instagramable bgt!

Result; 🏅🏅🏅🏅,5
Yes...recomended...4,5 stars...need to improve lil bit.but overall yes,highly recomended and make sure to book at Posto Dormire far from the due date! 😁👍🥰
title: Kamar yang sempurna

text: Salah satu hotel favorit saya , hotelnya lucu dan ada tempat spot yg lucu lucu dirooftopny cuman blm sempet foto karena tutup , manager dan karyawannya super friendly dan baik bgt hehhe thanks posto kamarnya juga lucu bgt buat acara acara juga hehhe

Dear Desicintia,

Terima kasih sudah meluangkan waktu untuk menulis ulasan di TripAdvisor
Kami sangat senang mengetahui bahwa produk dan pelayanan kami memenuhi harapan anda untuk mengadakan acara ulang tahun
Sebagai informasi bahwa rooftop kami beroperasional mulai dari pukul 5 sore hari sampai dengan tengah malam, jika ada keperluan di luar jam tersebut, staff front desk kami akan senang membantu
Komentar anda tentang karyawan yang friendly akan kami sampaikan kepada seluruh staff dan kami yakin hal tersebut akan memotivasi mereka untuk lebih baik lagi
Terima kasih dan kedatangan anda kembali ke Hotel Posto Dormire akan sangat kami tunggu

Best Regards,
Alpian Effendi

title: Pelayanan prima

text:
Hotel ini tergolong baru, infonya buka sep 2018. Hotel yang berdampingqn dengan amaris Yang sudah lebih dulu buka ini, memiliki ke khasan/ unik dengan arsitektur dan seni yang di kombinasi apik. Dari tampak depan sudah terlihat kombinasi desain modern minimalis berpadu dengan unsur kayu tua. 

Pemilik yang infonya Kolektor barang antik, menempatkan koper-koper coklat model lama dari kulit sebagai background meja resepsionis. Terdapat banyak koleksi barang antik lainnya di lobby seperti mesin ketik, mesin jahit, kamera, terdapat juga lukisan dinding. Lift dibalut dengan kayu Yang di cat chrome mengesankan barang metal. Yang wow dan membuat kagum adalah nuansa maritim di rooftop hotel ini, seolah sedang di ruang kemudi Kapal. Meski belum selesai semua namun hotel mengesankan seni dan tidak membuat bosan. Ada gaya dinosaurus juga di toilet rooftop, bercitarasa seni banget.

Yang juga tak kalah menjadi daya tarik, hanging transparent swimming pool nya Yang kabarnya dapat rekor MURI, meski tak begitu luas. Kamar juga bersih dan modern style. Menarik dan layak dihuni.
title: Unik, barang antik, instagramable

text: service nya juara banget! kamar bersih, toilet nya juga unik! sky lounge nya bikin nyaman sambil liat pemandangan malam👌 menu bubur di breakfast nya juara banget apalagi ditambah kuah kari kuning nya😍🤤 thanks untuk chef pak akbar (kalo nggak salah) haha udah bikin bubur seenak itu! ini sih bikin pengen balik lagiiiiii❣️
title: very kind service

text:
Hotel Baru di daerah Grogol, Bagus buat foto2, banyak spot2 instagramable sekali.

Ukuran kamar Buat tipe Deluxe bisa dibilang cukup kecil, tapi full carpet, terdapat LED TV, kulkas, Safe Deposit box. Kolam renang d Hotel tembus pandang ke Lobby, kolam renang kecil dan tidak terlalu luas, kedalaman hanya 1,2 Meter. Di lantai atas ada rooftoop, cuma cukup mahal, beer 1 botol 300ml 45++ . Sedangkan kita tinggal jalan 1 menit, di food court dekat sana beer 30ribu nett. Cari makan gampang, banyak tempat makan di sekitar sana. Untuk kamar ada jendela yg bisa dibuka, bisa Buat merokok. 

Kelemahan cuma 1, susah cari parkir, tamu hotel disuruh parkir sama tukang parkir liar disana, harus debat dlu sama security dlu baru dikasih valet di Hotel. Ada aja alasan katanya security yg bisa nyetir hanya 1. Harus bersikeras dlu baru dikasih. Kurang cocok bagi yg bawa kendaraan pribadi. 

Breakfast biaya aja, standard hotel bintang 2-3. Tidak ada omelette.
title: Review

text: Pelayanan nya sangat memuaskan terutama Mba Anastasia yang sangat informatif dan ramah, kamar yang diberikan sangat baik, bersih dan rapih. Very excellent. Pasti nya jika ada kesempatan pasti akan kembali

owner_response.text:
Dear MariaLG11

Terima kasih Anda telah memilih Posto Dormire Hotel sebagai tempat menginap selama berada di Jakarta. Senang sekali dapat menerima umpan balik yang positif atas pengalaman Anda selama di hotel Kami.

Saya akan memberitahukan komentar Anda kepada tim khususnya tentang penyambutan yang hangat oleh staf Kami bernama Aldo dan Edo. Saya yakin bahwa komentar ini akan menjadi motivasi bagi semua staf Kami. 

Sekali lagi terima kasih karena Anda telah memberitahukan pengalaman Anda, dan Saya berharap kunjungan Anda berikutnya akan sama memuaskan seperti kunjungan sebelumnya.

Hormat saya,

Rahmat Santoso
Guest Services Manager

text: Booked the room through the OTA and has been requested to have the room with the king bed, upon check-in the reception mentioned that there is only Twin Bed available in Superior room. As this is not my first time staying there, i informed that there is a possibilities for the housekeeping staff to manage the bed from twin bed into the King Bed with Hollywood style. The reception asked me to wait for 10 - 15 minutes but in fact from the beginning of check-in process until i get my room key it took almost an hour. Sadly, there is no information stated on the OTA that breakfast will be delivery to the room instead of at the restaurant. As a guest, i expect a very short check-in time since i did put my room preferences request clearly when i made the reservation. Instead of that the hotel prefer to ask me and waiting for the room instead of giving free upgrade to Deluxe which is in my opinion there is no different between superior and deluxe also based on the latest situation hotel might be also not facing a high occupancy at the time

text: My 3rd times came here. The first got room on 3rd floor which was v noisy because v close with pool and some of facilities inside didn't function well, kinda like last room for sell. Second one I forgot which room number but much much better than the first. The last was 515 which quite different, has no ornament lamp inside, no luggage rack, spot pillow case and AC leak. I don't mind with AC leaking because just a few drops which not really annoying. But yellow pillow case and has some spot on the other one, why it's still put on bed? Is this hotel doesn't have the clean one? When I check in the reception offer 1 bed with extra charge, for me it's not good. In this era, hotel need to collect good image of hospitality from guest. You can offer free upgrade just to attract the guest. In fact the room you gave us was not the good one with spot and leaking. Then when we ask for chop chili even the room service didn't deliver to our room, we have to take by ourselves and the staff looks not friendly by saying something to their colleague, even not friendly face. If I must pay for the chili, just tell the price and I will pay, not to receive kind of that service. Over all that was not a good service by far.
title: Lot of things to improve!

text: Staying here its good enough. The hotel concept and interior was great. Room clean and spacious. Minus on the view is so so. Suggest for this hotel is better provide the larger parking area. I should to pay additional for the illegal parking from the outside because the parking area always full. I can’t get the smoking room also, actually i already booked the smoking room from 3 days before stay☹️ Breakfast nice but the variant not much. Restaurant staff not really friendly, i pay for additional breakfast but she’s not give the warm welcome since i with my friends coming to the restaurant.
title: Experience staying here

text:
This hotel is situated close to Trisakti and some restaurants, and bit far from shopping centre such Citraland, Central Park, or TA. And I amazed at the many different types of art displayed, so unique and good interior concept and different with any hotels in Jakarta.  Good staffs.

The rooms are spacious with welcome greeting on the TV and a really good ambience but bad view. The room cleanliness is OK, well maintained with just basic equipment in the room. Bathroom is separated by glass wall and door (PS : it doesn't have a lock key). and covered by sandblast and curtain and washbin on the bedroom. 

Breakfast, just adequate, variety from the menu is OK but I understand it because pandemic issue. The service is good with the staff always remember us about health protocols, and using the mask when you take some food in public area/buffet. 

Posto has skylounge,  located on the rooftop, but you can't go there before 6pm and you must ask staffs if you want to access the lounge (I think the lounge is semi private, because I can't press the "skylounge" floor on the lift).  The skylounge was impeccable and beautiful concept, it feels like you ride a ship with a view, really like it. 

I think the swimming pool is great and marvellous concept, but sadly we can't use it because pandemic, including gym. The parking area is not so huge so don't be surprised if the parking area is crowded to street.

The hotel has implemented health protocol and comforting and with the reasonable price I highly recommend this hotel.
title: The interior concept is very different from other hotels, and very unique

text: It's my first time staying in this hotel but everything was simply awesome! I'd like to express my greatest gratitude for Mr. Johanes and the crews at Nominous Sky Bar for performing extra milestone towards me. They're super warm and the service was 10/10.
title: Outstanding Hotel

text:
Decided to have a short staycation here, nestled in Grogol area, the location is very strategic, near Busway TransJakarta bus stop (RS Sumber Waras and Grogol Terminal also). Surrounding neighborhood offers many restaurants, cafes, coffee shops, and mini marts if you need to do snacking and mineral water.

I was impressed by the interior, hotel lobby might be small but it's adorned by the comfy sofas, antique furniture with brown and dark color scheme to enhance the rustic atmosphere. The main scenery at the lobby is the floating see-through swimming pool upstairs. Yup the swimming pool located on the upstairs floor is visible through the lobby as you can see through the clear glass. There's a mini fitness center by the swimming pool too.

Checking in was fast so we rushed to the room, room offers a rustic feeling, clean, modern, yet very minimalist and compact. Bed was really comfy and size is large, air conditioner is also adjustable to your convenient and was really cool. Television only offers a small amounts of channel but who still watches television nowadays? lol

The bathroom is small yet compact, there's only one door to separate the bidet and the shower room. The sink is located outside the bathroom near the cupboard where you hang clothes. So effective and efficient for this kinda small room.

I also notice you can choose the music to your room bell, you can change to your liking and can start listening the music one by one, it's pretty fun lol.

Ok about the breakfast, it's pretty decent, not so many options but decent. Only a few local food like steamed rice, fried noodle, Balinese chicken, and urap. text:
When you enter the lobby, you will see a unique decoration and interior. 
The receptionist was very friendly and the check-in process was very fast. (approximately 10 minutes).

The hotel staffs are SUPER friendly and responsive. Our room is quite comfortable with a mini fridge. Standard TV channels and not too many choices.

Unfortunately you can still see the door is dusty (wood material). The drains don't seem too good, because when you shower it flows a little longer. On the first night the WIFI connection was a bit difficult to access, but the next day it worked fine.

We love the breakfast and it tastes SO GOOD! The price of foods at the restaurant and rooftop bars is still affordable and the atmosphere is really COZY..

One thing that we don't understand is the concept of a transparent swimming pool.
We thought, it's so strange and uncomfortable when you're swimming, then other people in the lobby or restaurant could see your body clearly. Feels like you become like an object in the aquarium *LOL.

But overall, we were very comfortable and happy with the hotel services provided and WOULD LOVE TO COME AGAIN! xoxo

Thank you so much and please stay safe and healthy! :)

title: Good place and have fun to holiday

text:
The moment you step into its Lobby, you can tell that this Hotel, despite its 3 star rating, is really serious about its decor. Industrial and Steampunk decoration dominated the entire hotel, without being gloomy and dark. The lighting is bright, some neon light make the ambience more lively at night. there were many painted wall. many corner of the hotel is instagrammable. 

When i arrived, Mas Naufal at receptionist quickly helped with my reservation, and it was one of the fastest check in experience i've ever had. Lucky to us, our room was ready, even when it was only 11.45 am (official check in time is 14.00), but Mas Naufal kind enough to let us in. this is rare flexibility nowadays! thanks!

Our double bed room is relatively big for such value, still dominated with steampunk design, 180cm queen bed is VERY comfortable, as they top the spring bed with another matress. There were plenty of power plug, almost one at wherever you are in the room. The huge mirror gives wide feeling to the room. I used the comfortable rattan chair by the long table to work at my laptop. there were water boiler with sugar tea and coffee.  they also provide small fridge (Without freezer) in the room. Television has some local and limited international channel.

Bathroom is a good size, separated toilet and shower booth. Water pressure coming out of the rainshower is very good. 3 in 1 shampoo, soap and conditioner is provided, Toothbrush is also provided. All of these amenities provided is of better quality than typical 3star hotel i've ever been. 

The room is quite clean, definitely meet my expectation. The aircon is okay, but not too cold, some guest might find it too warm. 

my only complaint was the fast wifi connection only works half of my stay. there seems to be little effort from hotel team to explain or fix the internet problem, the internet remain unaccessible until we check out the next day.

Their facilities include Gym and Swimming Pool. Oh the swimming pool get special mention here. it has transparent bottom (sees through down to the lobby !) definitely one of its kind, in fact i've never been at one ANYWHERE in the world. 

i didn't get their breakfast so can't comment on that, but the place is very well located at west jakarta, which is heaven for food. there were endless of many good food you can order from delivery apps like gojek or grab. 

in Summary, this hotel offer VERY GOOD VALUE, that easily beat other 3 star rating hotel. highly recommend this to everyone. and will definitely stay here again when i got the chance
title: TRANSPARENT SWIMMING POOL OMG, Good Value, Cool Decor, Friendly Staff and Well Located

text:
I stayed in this hotel from the 24th June until the 29th of June. 
Previously, I was only planning to stay for 4 nights and will move to the other hotel on the 5th night near the train station. But instead I decided to stay in this hotel rather than to move because they gave me an experience that was above my expectation. I just would like to thank the housekeeper on the 25th June afternoon who added water bottle to my room because I just asked for additional water, but instead the housekeeper also took out the rubbish bin, organised the washbasin and changed the towels. I am glad that the housekeeper did not touched any of my personal stuff. I am very thankful for his/her high initiative. The breakfast were overall nice as they changed their menu everyday, but the attendant in charge for breakfast could not memorise my room number even though I have been joining breakfast on the same time, with the same people. 
A night before my check out, I asked the Front Desk staff to make me a takeaway breakfast since I will be checking out early the next morning. But when I asked for my breakfast, the front desk staff went to the kitchen to make my breakfast for almost 40 minutes to make 2 pax of toasted bread, saying that there's no night shift. He explained to me politely and felt sorry but I was not in a hurry, so it was fine for me. 
Other than that, I called '0' for wine glass assistance, but I was connected to the F&B extension, waited for 1 minute, no one answered. Then I called the restaurant extension written on paper beside the phone, they asked me to call lounge since wine glasses are from lounge, he gave me the extension, no one answered. I called back to the front desk to have them call the lounge, instead she wanted to connect the phone to the lounge. Instead of waiting for minutes just to call, I went to the sky lounge myself and finally got the glass. 
The sky lounge was amazingly beautiful and calming, they have their own unique design, the swimming pool was also absolutely stunning for a 3,5stars hotel and room was also super clean, in addition, street food are just behind the hotel with only just a minute walk. 
Overall I am satisfied for this hotel even though there were some missed out points, but I surely will be back next time when I visit Jakarta.

text:
Good points: Hotel is nice. The design is indeed very beautiful, bed is comfortable, room temperature was good and there is a TV with a good variety of channels.

Bad points: In my point of view, breakfast lacked a bit. There was not so many variety and very poor western options. One day, there was not even black coffee.
I had a unpredictable situation with my card. Arriving at the hotel I could not pay in advanced and explained them they situation and asked with they could charge a security deposit while I wait for a relative to send me money via Western Union. They keeped my passport and refused to give me back so I could not pick up the cash on Western Union! Absolutely ridiculous -  I offered them other payment options (PayPal, bank transfer...but they didn't accept anything). After I called booking.com and reported the situation they send an employee to Western Union with me, but I could not even touch my passport.
I learned that what they did was ilegal. Passport is a government property and they have no right to keep it.

Not very close to central Jakarta and no many eating options around. However, food at the restaurant is good.

text:
I realise this hotel actually few times ago. but I just know the actual name few days ago. suddenly I book this hotel via online travel agent for my staycation this month. and this hotel is amazing and blowing your mind.

the concept is very artistic and anti mainstream but the good thing is affordable price. industrial warehouse concept. another things that I want to highlight is teh hospitality was amazing. I felt like I stay in 5 star hotel. Amazing

Actually I booked smart room but I realise this room only has a twin room, then I call to the hotel and asked for hollywood bed. unfortunately when I came the room was full. But with a quick response of them, I got upgraded to Deluxe Room which had a double bed room. 

the room isn't that big but super comfortable with the concept. I love it. I super duper love it. I got room on the 3rd floor. next to gym and hanging transparent pool. the sound from that area didnt annoy us, the room still quiet and comfortable.

parking area can accommodate around 7 cars inside the building. 

cons :
1. my room's phone not working but it is ok since i call them through their hotel cellphone.
2. a bit slippery and watery on the way to my room due to next to pool
3. should be announcement for pool can be used only with swim wear to make high hygienity
4. the pool water was a bit greeny. should have more attention to this since many guests swim not with a swim wear.

after all, this is a great place for family or couple to stay or just have a staycation in Jakarta. a good concept and a good hospitality. will stay here for another night. see you!
title: an excellent and unique place to stay

text:
A very uniquely designed hotel with a very unique name, Posto Dormire. When I stayed here, it had not been a month from its opening day. IMHO the rate was pretty budget friendly. You can feel the uniqueness of this hotel the moment you step into the lobby. Look at the ceiling, which is bottom of a see through swimming pool located on the third floor. Too bad it was under maintenance during my stay. Take a look around the lobby there are so many instagrammable spot to take pictures. The furniture, the graffiti on the walls were so eye catching. 

Check in check out process was quick and efficient, and the the front desk staffs were nice and friendly. The room was like any other budget in size, but it was uniquely decorated, trendy not boring. Basic amenities; TV, electric water kettle, safe deposit box, a small fridge, clothe hangers are provided, and was working properly. Nothing to complain about. The wifi speed and connectivity was so so though.

Breakfast buffet was okay for a budget hotel. I must say better than some other other budget hotels I've been to. The varieties indeed were limited, but the taste was good. I had lunch at the restaurant after I check out. I randomly chose one from the shocking promo menu, gyutan don, a Japanese dish. It was definitely not like a gyutan don I usually have, not even close. Way too spicy and rich in flavour for a gyutan don. But it was okay, they shouldn't have had named the dish gyutan don.

Like as what I've mentioned earlier, the hotel had not had not been a month from its opening. I saw some construction workers seems to be doing some works here and there. There are two elevators in the hotel but only one is in service, the other one I don't know for what is the reason, it was not in service. So mostly I had wait for quite a while to use the elevator.

Overall, I love the hotel uniqueness, I definitely would like to stay at Posto Dormire again when they are 100% complete.
title: A very uniquely designed hotel with a budget friendly rate

text:
２年９ヶ月ぶりに、インドネシア最良のホテル『Post Dormire Hotel』に来ました。
昔のスタッフが少ししかいなくて、ちょっと残念です。
皆さんに、会いたかったな〜。

久しぶりに泊まった感想を書きます。

★良かった事
今回、滞在中に体調が悪くなりました。
その時スタッフ達は『何か手伝うことありますか？』と、私達に声を掛けてくれ、飲み物や食べ物を部屋まで運んでくれました。
特に受付のALDO（アルド）さんには、本当に心優しく接していただき感謝しています。

★オーナーへのお願い
スタッフの皆さんは頑張ってメンテナンスしてくれていますが、古い設備は少しでも新しくしてあげると、お客様は喜ぶしスタッフはメンテナンスの負担が少なくなると思います。
できる範囲で構わないので、よろしくお願いします。

今も変わらず、低コストで高印象のとても良いホテルです。私はインドネシアに行く全ての人に、このホテルをお勧めします。

ホテルスタッフの皆さん、次もインドネシアに来る時はDormireに泊まるので、また会いましょう。
title: 昔と変わらずDormireのスタッフはフレンドリーで、とても良いホテルです！

فندق لطيف ونظيف والقروب الموجود فيه جميل ومتعاون 
توجد أعمال صيانة في الأدوار العليا مزعجة في الصباح 

الفطور متوسط إلى عادي
title: شكرآ

text:
Bardzo polecam Posto Dormire, hotel w dobrym położeniu blisko przystanki autobusowe oraz galerie handlowe. 
Pokoje czyste i przestronne, świetny basen ze szklanym dnem 🤩 
Jedzenie w hotelowej restauracji mego pyszne. 
Obsługa zawsze miła i bardzo pomocna. 
Restauracja na dachu super. 
Polecam
title: Świetny hotel, genialna obsługa.

text:
Abbiamo soggiornato una notte in questo hotel carinissimo e di design! La hall è davvero bella e particolare! 
Staff gentile e disponibile.
Wifi ben funzionante.
Camera pulita e con tutti i comfort necessari.
Colazione non molto varia, soprattutto la parte dolce.
Qualità prezzo ottimo!! Consigliato!
title: OTTIMO HOTEL!
